WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces.
WorkItem.Description: When you load typescriptServices.js together with QUnit.js you will see errors. This is because QUnit defines a global called 'module' with a property 'exports'. However, this happens to fulfill the check for NodeJS so that 'getNodeEnvironment' is executed. The latter fails to run the synchronous require function.
WorkItem.Summary: typescriptServices.js doesn't play well in QUnit env
